author: babyxbt
content: People are foaming at the mouth for this. I proposed the question on Twitter & Reddit - I participated in one good spaces yesterday but Bitcoin maxies ended up being the loudest voice. They had government officials (foreign), fund managers, and miners participation .. I can request US Senator Pat Toomeyâ€™s participation (owns ETH via grayscale and big believer in ether) US senator Bob Casey & US congressman Matt Cartwright through my personal contacts - just throwing out some ideas
